blocks.subject: Re: Confirm Desk Group
text: I don't know who Laura Dewett is, but the other three are on "my" Confirm
desk.  We have a couple of new people starting next week, so I'll send you an
updated list as soon as they're set up for e-mail access.

blocks.subject: Confirm Desk Group
raw_header: cc: Tana Jones/HOU/ECT@ECT, Samantha Boyd/NA/Enron@Enron, Stephanie
text: As mentioned in my voice mail -- please advise as to whether the following
